casebody.data:
Patrick OBENCHAIN, as the Guardian Ad Litem for Conan Obenchain, a minor, Appellant,
v.
OUTDOOR PROMOTIONS, LLC; Bustop Shelters of Nevada, Inc.; CBS Outdoor, Inc.; Regional Transportation Commission of Southern Nevada; and Clark County, Respondents. No. 67434 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JUNE 27, 2017

REVERSED AND REMAND.
